{{Infobox ability poe2 | name = Checkmate | icon = coordinated_positioning_icon.png | description = Exert your supremacy to switch positions with a single enemy. If you are a higher level than your foe, you will make a Full Attack on them in the process. (Checkmate) - If you swap positions with an enemy and that becomes surrounded by two or more of your allies, they will be Stunned. | added_in = poe2 | class = | subclass = | race = | subrace = | activation = Active | activation_req = | combat_only = yes | ability_type = | ability_level = 1 | ability_origin = Equipment | modal_group = | learn_type = | learn_level = | learn_level_mc = | learn_req = | upgrades_from = Capture | upgrades_to = | keywords = | counters = | source = | source_cost = | uses = 2 | restoration = Rest | cast_time = 0.5 | recovery_time = 0.0 | range = 4 | area_of_effect = | duration = | linger = | noise_use = Quiet | noise_impact = Quiet | target = | effects = | target_1 = Target | effects_1 = [[Status effects (Deadfire)#Stunned|Stunned]] for 8.0 sec
